about_the_game:
Stock Market Tycoon: Challenge is the ultimate multiplayer stock market investment game where you can put your trading skills to the test, competing with players from around the world, to outperform your competitors and become an investment tycoon! The game provides a realistic and dynamic stock trading experience in a simulated fast-paced economy. Manage your portfolio, either searching for the best dividend returns or making short term gains from momentum trading. Each "season" lasts one month, with dividend returns daily.

Key Features:

  • Real-Time Stock Market Simulation: Trade live stocks in a simulated economy and manage your portfolio in a real-time simulated stock exchange. Buy, sell, and hold shares to maximise your profit and outperform other players.

  • Multiplayer Competition: Challenge friends or compete with thousands of players globally in a battle for returns. Every percentage gain will count against your competitors. Rise up the leaderboard and showcase your skills, proving you are the ultimate Stock Market Investor.

  • Seasonal Competition: Each season lasts one month (allowing for 28-31 "years" of dividends). Competition will be fierce as investors scramble to maximise portfolio returns.

  • Leaderboards, Rankings and Ratings: All active players are ranked in the season will be ranked, and an overall investment rating will be calculated from your overall performance across many seasons.

  • Awards: Players earn awards for achieving trading profit milestones, as well as ranking well at the end of a season. Accumulate and show off your awards.

  • In-Game Market Events, News & Recommendations: Market news provides players with timely information on changes and performance of the overall economy, individual sectors or stocks. Keep up to date, and make timely portfolio decisions.

  • Portfolio Management: Trade for the long term, seeking high dividend yields, or trade more frequently, chasing the short-term trading gains. There are multiple paths to success; be first, be smarter, or be sneaky.

  • Create Investment Firms: Create and investment firm and join with your friends. Play competitively or cooperatively to ensure your firm ranks among the highest. There are no rules here against working together to manipulate the market. (Not saying you should, but not saying you shouldn't...)

Why play Stock Market Tycoon: Challenge?

Are you fascinated by the world of stocks and investments? Do you think you have what it takes to dominate the stock market and outperform the competition? Do you just love the challenge and enjoy seeing your value increase? Whether you are working toward your own goals, or fighting over the leaderboards, Stock Market Tycoon: Challenge gives you the perfect platform to test your trading abilities in a fast-paced, competitive environment. The game combines entertainment and education, making it ideal for players who want to improve their financial literacy while having fun.

highlighted.name: The First Million is the Hardest

name: Stock Market Tycoon: Challenge

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 Serise or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 500 Series or AMD Radeon™ HD6000 Series (VRAM 1GB) or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A competitive multiplayer real-time stock market investment game where players compete globally to achieve maximum investment returns. Trade live stocks in a simulated economy and manage your portfolio in a real-time virtual stock exchange.
